item.title: Disrupting ransom payments
item.description: Published on CoinDesk What do the smart watch makerGarmin, the Isreali insurerShirbit, the electronics manufacturerFoxconn,Delaware county in Pennsylvania, the foreign exchange companyTravelex, the alcohol producerCampari and theBaltimore Public School system have in common? They were all hit by ransomware attacks this year. Ransomware attacks are when hackers gain access to the computer systems of the victim, and threaten to expose them or render them useless unless the victim pays a ransom.
